errors.condition: If a customer already exists with the exact title,name and address then a new record will not be created
errors.rationale: If a customer of the same title, name and address exists then it should be retrievable through the search operation
errors.errorMessage: A customer already exists with the same title, name and address.  Please use the search functionality to retrieve this customer or use the customer ID <XXXX>
errors.actionNeeded: Either use the title, name and address to find the customer or use the customer id returned in the error message.
